related_materials.name: Lactated Ringers Injection, USP, Preservative-Free, Baxter
Ethiqa XR Buprenorphine Extended-Release Injectable Suspension for Mice and Rats 1.3mg/mL, 3mL

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c0dcl","text":"Fill burr holes with bone wax or Kwick-Cast.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"biqf9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ubdv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6kodc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e0hso","text":"Ensure wax or Kwick-Cast is only within burr hole. Residue from wax or silicone on skull can compromise Metabond seal.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ijpi","text":"Attach Dovetail Clamp to stereotaxic arm and attach stylus. Center stylus over headframe fiducial point and then raise stylus slightly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90hf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e27on","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aq0r4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2kjoj","text":"Depending on the headframe or head bar desired, the fiducial point may vary. For example the Titanium LC/Brainstem headframe utilizes the Bregma stylus with Bregma as a fiducial point.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5snf","text":"Replace the stylus with the headframe and lower until there is contact with the skull.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1a509","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"814tb","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"arv9o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"alt":"","guid":"A544F773E7EC11EFBF9E0A58A9FEAC02","height":152.4472727272728,"id":559826,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"92daa\",\"text\":\"Image of DHC headframe lowered onto skull.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Image (57).jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ssdmb7ni7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcyub7ni7.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcytb7ni7.webp","width":160.01145038167948}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2mutd","text":"Apply white Metabond around the outside of the headframe. Metabond should wick under and into the headframe. If it becomes too viscous, remake it. Place Metabond so the majority of the skull within the well remains exposed. Let dry completely (around  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":251,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"428ke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ljpi","text":"Use clear Metabond to seal the rest of the skull within the inside well. Allow all metabond to completely dry (around   ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7pejv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5s2g","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fqarp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"alt":"","guid":"3BB31D3DE7EE11EFBF9E0A58A9FEAC02","height":134.86545454545455,"id":559828,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"dfbtb\",\"text\":\"Image of completed surgery with well.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Image (59).jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/ssdpb7ni7.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcywb7ni7.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcyvb7ni7.webp","width":127.45017182130584}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2b9lk","text":"Obtain the mouseâs postoperative weight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d13h","text":"Place the mouse back in a recovery cage and put the cage on the   heat plate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"1E62E4D02B3611EEA8A0C9E1BC054B44","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3kat","text":"Reference General Setup and Takedown Procedures for Rodent Neurosurgery protocol for takedown procedure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":10,"length":61}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3BBBEF38CA4845A18656E3153C442524","url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/general-setup-and-takedown-procedures-for-rodent-n-cj5uuq6w/materials"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m93q","text":"After hair removal and disinfection, create a midline incision with a scalpel blade from approximately behind the eyes to the front of the ears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9eenn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"u2ln","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30m76","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b0062","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B7B4D75F2DA611EFB1BA0A58A9FEAC02","height":248.18909090909094,"id":559830,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"5f3qs\",\"text\":\"Illustration of initial skin incision on mouse head.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}},{\"key\":\"674kv\",\"text\":\"Mouse fixed to stereotaxic instrument base via bite bar and ear bars. Fur from top of head has been removed and skin has been sterilized (see General Setup and Takedown Procedures). \",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Surgical_Mice_NEW_05_updated.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qunvb7ni7.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcyyb7ni7.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcyxb7ni7.webp","width":268.18074656188605}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d3asv","text":"Using Vanna scissors, cut a teardrop shape of skin away, ensuring enough skull is exposed for headframe placement.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fiukt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rshj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"33r1n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1FA22D632DA711EFB1BA0A58A9FEAC02","height":238.4945454545454,"id":559832,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"8of29\",\"text\":\"Illustration of skin removal on mouse head.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":"image/png","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"Surgical_Mice_NEW_06a_updated.png","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/qunyb7ni7.png","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcy2b7ni7.jpg","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/tcyzb7ni7.webp","width":282.69827586206895}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4nfu0","text":"Remove exposed periosteum by rubbing it apart with cotton swabs and bunching it near the edges of the skin. Then cut away with vanna scissors at the skin edge. Use ACSF to rehydrate if necessary (i.e. periosteum dries out).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bht9q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2h8l","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9ag2q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6abo5","text":"Utilize a 10mL or 20mL syringe, 25G 5/8-inch needle, and a syringe filter to store and dispense ACSF.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebokf","text":"Seal all along incision site with Vetbond. Use a Sugi Absorption Spear to absorb any excess fluid either prior or during. Extend vetbond seal 1-2mm past incision site along undamaged skin. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dsf5c","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7coln","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"654g3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b883v","text":"Extending the vetbond seal over healthy tissue delays the formation of exudate. Additionally, unsealed soft tissue will weep fluid that can compromise the attachment of the headframe.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cb4o1","text":" On the anterior side expose the rostral rhinal vein between the eyes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3akvt","text":"On the left and right lateral sides stop at the interface between the skull and cheek muscle.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ug2i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4lb05","text":"Posteriorly expose about   -    of neck muscle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"D41C9C1037B511EE93150A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"1"}},"1":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"D41C9C8337B511EE93150A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":201,"value":"2"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9np0g","text":"Locate Bregma and Lambda landmarks with Dovetail Clamp and Bregma Stylus, and use them to level the skull in the anterior-posterior axis within 0.1mm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1p4dq","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83hml","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e98pu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"AE8383C807C546698727E6FCF724570E","height":102,"is_video":false,"legend":"{\"blocks\":[{\"key\":\"19ksm\",\"text\":\"Illustration of Bregma and Lambda landmarks.\",\"type\":\"unstyled\",\"depth\":0,\"inlineStyleRanges\":[],\"entityRanges\":[],\"data\":{}}],\"entityMap\":{}}","mime":null,"nestedSelector":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"data:image/png;base64,","shadow":false,"source":"data:image/png;base64,","width":200}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b9r9f","text":"If Lambda-Bregma offset is greater than 0.1mm in X, use the yaw adjustment on the stereotaxic alignment system to adjust the yaw within 0.1mm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cd61u","text":"At midline, approximately midway between Bregma and Lambda, measure 2mm laterally on both the left and right hemisphere, ensuring that the skull is level in the medial-lateral axis within 0.15mm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a4vcg","text":"Skip to section \"Headframe Placement\" if not performing virus injections.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6tpnr","text":"Reference protocol Stereotaxic Injection by Nanoject Protocol V.6 for performing stereotactic injections via nanoject:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":46}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ignp","text":"dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bp2l6nr7kgqe/v6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"lnen","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e8sgg","text":"Begin at step 8.2.5\"Mark the Injection Site\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":30},{"style":"italic","offset":19,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r42v","text":"Stop at step 8.5 \"Suturing\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":17,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"ECAD88E5E33F11EFB6510A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bp2l6nr7kgqe/v6"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3v0ur","text":"Reference protocol Stereotaxic Surgery for Delivery of Tracers by IontophoresisÂ V.6 for performing stereotactic injections via Iontophoresis:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":19,"length":64}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49i5n","text":"dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.14egn8ewzg5d/v6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":48}],"data":{}},{"key":"249tr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m6jb","text":"Begin at step 8.2.6 \"Mark the Injection Site\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":31},{"style":"italic","offset":20,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahbvi","text":"Stop at step 8.5 \"Suturing\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":14},{"style":"italic","offset":17,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B97F7685E33F11EFB6510A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.14egn8ewzg5d/v6"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uai4","text":"If target coordinates require an angled injection, rotate mouse before proceeding with the injection. Return to level once injection has been completed and pipette has been removed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2h39c","text":"If desired, mark coordinates on skull with Sharpie.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6usds","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"def06","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6vp7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"73vn8","text":"It is often useful to mark coordinates indicating either Bregma, Lambda or future location of burr hole craniotomy.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ei0q8","text":"Score entire skull with scalpel blade to provide greater surface area for bonding agents. Do not obstruct any landmarks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"412lg","text":"Detach visible neck muscles using dumont forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dd97g","text":"Seal entire skull with Vetbond.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"83sfs","text":"Remove mouse from stereotaxic instrument base once metabond is fully dry. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4kq5o","text":"Detach Dovetail Clamp from headframe carefully.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"32ni1","text":"Remove earbars.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fihf0","text":"Remove mouse teeth from bitebar by lightly scruffing mouse in a way that raises the teeth out of the bite bar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Stereotactic Injections with Headframe Implant
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"97sm6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95ht6","text":"Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) should be used at all times while operating this protocol.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dtrip","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo1pg","text":"Isoflurane Warning: Acute over-exposure to waste anesthetic gases (WAG) may cause eye irritation, headache, nausea, drowsiness or dizziness. Repeated exposure may cause damage to cardiovascular system and central nervous system. Refer to MSDS for additional information. Consult the surgical workstation guide to ensure all parts of the dispensation rig are functioning properly.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk6sa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a4sh","text":"Blue-light filter safety goggles must be worn while using LED curing light.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81ujp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
